vista.graph
Class GECanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  vista.graph.GECanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ElementContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimatorCanvas, ZoomOverview
public class GECanvas
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ElementContext

This class handles the passing of messages to and from the GraphicElement object. Furthermore it provides the GraphicElement object with the drawing context and the drawing area. Double buffering is activated for performance reasons.

Version:
$Id: GECanvas.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:57 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
Serialized Form

redoNextPaint

public void redoNextPaint()
This prepares the next paint call for redoing the whole GraphicElement. This means layout + actual drawing of components

Specified by:
redoNextPaint in interface ElementContext

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
paint method is overrided and graph layout + draw is called. This method handles double buffering as well.
